history.proof: intros d0 d1 t H. unfold reconnait, inter. split; intros. + shelve. + shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : DTA t : term H : dta_compatible d0 d1 H0 : match d0 with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end /\\ match d1 with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end Unable to unify "Prop" with "match match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end".

exceptions.tactic: intros s0 s1 Hcompat Hrecon1 Hrecon2.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment d0, d1 : DTA t : term H : dta_compatible d0 d1 H0 : match match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end The term "t" has type "term" while it is expected to have type "preDTA".

In environment d0, d1 : DTA t : term H : dta_compatible d0 d1 H0 : match match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end The term "t" has type "term" while it is expected to have type "preDTA".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (t : term), dta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnait d0 t /\ reconnait d1 t <-> reconnait (inter d0 d1) t

Premises:
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
inter = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
predta_inter_reciproque : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t
predta_inter_direct : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t
predta_inter_def_1 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t : term -> Prop
predta_inter_def_0 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t : term -> Prop
dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_r a1 s1 (M2 state s00 s01) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 state (M2 state (preDTA_produit s00 s10) (preDTA_produit s00 s11)) (M2 state (preDTA_pro...
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
term_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t : term, P t t) -> (forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t (app a tl)) -> forall t t0 : term, term_occur t t0 -> P t t0
term_list_term_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_list_term_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_term_list_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_list_rect : forall P : term_list -> Type, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
term_rec : forall P : term -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
term_occur_0_2 : forall t : term, term_occur_def_0 t -> forall t0 : term_list, term_occur_def_1 t0 -> term_occur_def_1 (tcons t t0)
invar_2 : forall t : term, invar_term t -> forall t0 : term_list, invar_list t0 -> invar_list (tcons t t0)
semantic_equiv_0_7 : forall t : term, sem_equiv_prop_t t -> forall t0 : term_list, sem_equiv_prop_l t0 -> sem_equiv_prop_l (tcons t t0)
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0

``` 
intros d0 d1 t H. unfold reconnait, inter. split; intros [H1 H2].
- split; intros.
  + apply (predta_inter_def_0 t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat Hrecon1 Hrecon2.
    apply H1. apply Hcompat. apply Hrecon1. apply Hrecon2.
  + apply (predta_inter_reciproque t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat.
    apply H2. apply Hcompat.
- apply (predta_inter_direct t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat.
  apply H2. apply Hcompat.
```

original: intros d0 d1 t H. unfold reconnait, inter. split; intros [H1 H2]. - split; intros. + apply (predta_inter_def_0 t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat Hrecon1 Hrecon2. apply H1. apply Hcompat. apply Hrecon1. apply Hrecon2. + apply (predta_inter_reciproque t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat. apply H2. apply Hcompat. - apply (predta_inter_direct t). intros s0 s1 Hcompat. apply H2. apply Hcompat.
